title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 275.2 - Official representative of board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 275.2 - Official representative of board

State Regulations

The arbitrator designated by the executive secretary or by
the assistant to the executive secretary or by such other person as may be
authorized to do so, shall be deemed to be and shall act as official
representative of the Board of Mediation in the particular matter assigned to
him. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
275.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
